PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15392018-12-06,  ,  ,  PSPC, 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Services and Fees Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL SERVICES AND FEES REGULATIONS in order to help Canada Post continue to meet its universal service commitment, to offer an accessible, affordable and cost-effective postal service for all Canadians no matter where they live and to operate on a self-sustaining financial basis.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0274 Publication Date: 2018-12-26
